title: Man belongs to the earth
creator_credit: Paramount Pictures, Roman Kroitor and Graeme Ferguson
brief_description: Deals with the natural environment of United States cities, the desert, the oceans, and the mountains. Shows the dead waste and destruction threatening the environment, and the natural wonders that should be preserved. Presents the problems and some solutions.
creator_credit_for_label: Paramount Pictures, Roman Kroitor and Graeme Ferguson
